verses.roman:
sei ta' kāraṇārṇave sei saṅkarṣaṇa
āpanāra eka aṁśe karena śayana

synonyms: sei—that; ta'-certainly; kāraṇa-arṇave—in the ocean of cause, or Causal Ocean; sei—that; saṅkarṣaṇa—Lord Saṅkarṣaṇa; āpanāra—of His own; eka—one; aṁśe—by the part; karena śayana—lies down.
translation: In that ocean lies one plenary portion of Lord Saṅkarṣaṇa.
